transcript:
Customer: Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh abhi dusre call par vyast hai. Kripya pratiksha karein ya kuch samay pashchat prayas karein.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good afternoon Mr. Praveen baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Mr. Praveen ji Manish bol raha hun IndiaMART se. Aapne ek request raise kari hui thi video meeting ke liye, right? Kashish aapke account manager hain. She is trying to connect you last 15-20 days but aapka number nahi lag raha tha. To ek baar baat kar lenge aap? Just minute sir, just minute. Main Kashish ko transfer kar raha hun, just minute, just be online.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Hello. Good afternoon sir. Ji ji, abhi aapne video meeting ke liye interest show kiya, main call kar rahi hun but aapka call nahi lag raha tha. Maine WhatsApp message bhi kiya aapko sir. Ji sir.
Customer: Achcha achcha. To ji bataiye sir kya issue aa raha hai?
Executive: Koi baat nahi.
Customer: Issue wahi aa raha hai ki leads nahi aa rahi hai ab us pe maine jo bhi kiya hai abhi reply wagera.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Jaise abhi to chair handle ki wali consume kari aapne jo aapki category non-active thi, chair handle.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji kari hai na.
Executive: Theek hai, ye category to aapki active ho gayi hai sir. Abhi jo aapne brochure bheja hai na, woh hum add kar rahe hain profile mein. Aur sir humein na ek video meeting karni hai aapse jismein mere manager bhi rahenge. To ek baar na hamare kuch pointers hain sir jaise ki aapke jo direct calls aati hain, theek hai? Direct inquiry aati hain, kitni aapko direct inquiry aa rahi hai, ek baar aapne us pe baat kari ki nahi, theek hai? Aapke pass rating review kya hai? To ek baar ye pointers dekh lete hain aur hamari jo category profile mein added hai na sir, usme kuch aur category agar add kar sake hum profile mein to ek baar woh bhi dekh lete hain. Keywords jo hamare added hai na, uske alawa bhi hamare pass multiple keyword hai sir. Kya hum woh keyword isme add kar sakte hain profile mein? Aur aapki category mein kitni buying abhi hain, kitni humne consume kari hain ek baar.
Customer: Theek hai aap ek bari na uska mujhe haan haan ek bari na woh mere ko aap sara jo bhi aapne data collect kiya hua hai keywords ka aur uska woh mere ko ek bari share kar dena fir ye meeting rakh lenge next week mein. Abhi tab tak hum isko haan haan.
Executive: Next week mein.
Customer: To achcha but aapka concern to aaj raise hua hai na sir to woh humein sir aaj karna padega.
Customer: Haan woh to main aaya hua tha to maine kaha chalo raise kar deta hun ab main abhi nikal raha tha kahin pe. To us time aapka contact nahi bana to koi baat nahi ab ya fir kal subah ka rakh lete hain.
Executive: Kal subah ka. Shaam tak hi possible ho sir to ek baar agar aap ek bari mujhe data wagera collect kar dijiye na matlab mujhe bhi to dekhna padega na kya kaun si lead kam aa rahi hai kahan kam aa rahi hai.
Customer: Jaise ki chair arm set mein hamare pass jo multiple category hain, theek hai? Ki arm set chair hai chair accessories hai aapka office chair component hai, chair parts hai, theek hai? Aapka PU molded form hai. Isme hamare pass multiple categories hain jaise ki aapka PU form, polyurethane form sheet, molded form, sofa form.
Customer: Sheet nahi hai, sheet nahi hai hamari. Wohi cheezein aap ek bari list bana lenge main usko na main aapko bata dunga kaun kaun si cheezein hain jismein hum deal nahi kar rahe hain, irrelevant aati hain unki na. Ek bari aap jo jo bhi aapke pass aa rahi hai na categories jismein chair fitting ka bhi aa raha hoga.
Executive: Alternate name jo keywords aa rahe hain, haan.
Customer: Chair chair parts ka hai jo woh usme chair parts mein hamara aata to hai lekin chair ki fitting mein nahi aata ye.
Executive: Achcha. To usme kya hota hai fitting ki fitting ki woh aa jati hain leads aa jati hain woh hamare matlab ki nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Abhi review rating to aapne ek buyer se Deepak to sir hi hai na aapke unhone aapke profile par rating di hai abhi sir 5 tarikh mein last month.
Customer: Mujhe pata nahi ab number unka aur woh kya rating di hai unhone?
Executive: Five star diya. Kal ka diya hai. Achchi rating di hai matlab five star diye last month mein aapki profile ko diye sir prime rose ko. Mujhe nahi aapki profile ko.
Customer: Achcha achcha ye kahan pe dete hain rating?
Executive: Rating jaise ki lead manager hai aapka, theek hai? Lead manager mein kisi bhi buyer ne inquiry post kari to lead manager se hum unko rating ke liye link bhej sakte hain ask for review likh ke aata hai niche. To woh link hum wahan se bhej sakte hain lead manager se.
Customer: Lead manager mein main chala gaya. Isse kahan jana hai aap?
Executive: Theek hai aapne kisi buyer se baat kari lead manager mein conversation hua kisi buyer se aapka?
Customer: Haan ji abhi hua hai.
Executive: Theek hai wahan par niche ek link aati hai ask for review.
Customer: Jaise ki niche jo rate now.
Executive: Theek hai sir main aapko Google meeting ki link share kar do abhi abhi aap desktop par bhi hain sir sahi rahega.
Customer: Kar dijiye main matlab jyada der nahi kar paunga matlab mujhe 3 baje se pehle na haan haan kar lo aap.
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir. Main aapko link share karti hun ji sir.
Customer: Kispe mail pe bhejoge? Whatsapp pe.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving enough buyleads.

- Wants to discuss category and keyword optimization.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meeting to discuss concerns.

- Agreed to share data on keywords and categories.

- Executive shared details of a recent 5-star rating.

- Executive offered to share a Google Meet link.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share Google Meet link on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, video meeting, keywords, categories, rating
